content: Pikachu used thunderbolt! The attack was supereffective. Gyarados fainted. Rival sent out Rhydon.

Great job! Taking out Gyarados with Thunderbolt was a smart move. Now that Rhydon is on the field, Pikachu's Electric-type moves will be super effective against it as well. Considering Pikachu's moveset, using Thunderbolt again would be a good choice to target Rhydon's Ground typing weakness. Keep up the momentum!
